articles.title: Trump says Microsoft in talks to buy TikTok - BBC.com
articles.description: The US President says he would like to see a "bidding war" over the sale of the social media app.
articles.content:
US President Donald Trump has said Microsoft is in discussions to acquire TikTok and that he would like to see a "bidding war" over the sale of the social media app.
When asked by reporters whether … [+1985 chars]

articles.author: Kent Erdahl
articles.title: 'It's bigger than money' | Pride organizers, Black business owners take stand over Target dropping DEI - KARE11.com
articles.description: Twin Cities Pride asked Target not to participate this year, while some Black business owners are asking people not to shop at the retailer.
articles.content:
MINNEAPOLIS Andi Otto never imagined he'd be in the position of turning away sponsorship money from Target.
Late last week, the executive director of Twin Cities Pride was doing the exact opposite. … [+4696 chars]
